title: The Willing Sister
description: “The Willing Sister” She is more than willing to meet his demands, but life just won’t let her be satisfied. Carolyn Prism is the author of a popular blog who finds herself hungry for the man behind the food of a new Italian bistro. Filled with intense desire, Carolyn is more than willing to meet Roberto anywhere or anytime. And, whenever they do get together their fiery passion seems unstoppable… but something always pulls them apart. Tormented by life’s constant interruptions will Carolyn and Roberto ever find the time to just be together? Beginning at a crucial turn of events from the first story, “The Reluctant Cougar”, this short story gives a more detailed account of the dynamics of Victoria and David’s romance, while Carolyn begins her passionate love affair with the head chef of D’Angelo’s Bistro, Roberto D’Angelo.
author: Cressida Wilkes
